00062 int VerseTreeItem::row() const
00063 {
00064     if (m_parent)
00065     {
00066         return std::distance(m_parent->m_children.begin(), std::find_if(m_parent->m_children.begin(), m_parent->m_children.end(), &(*_1) == this));
00067     }
00068 
00069     return 0;
00070 }
